name: photo-of-the-day-gateway-at-sunset
title: Photo Of The Day: Gateway At Sunset
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Photo Of The Day is a recurring feature on Nashvillest as long as you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just drop them in the pool and we’ll fish ‘em out. Photo by Paul Beavers.
contentEncoded:
Photo Of The Day is a recurring feature on Nashvillest as long as you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just drop them in the pool and we’ll fish ‘em out.

Photo by Paul Beavers.
